name: BattleReign
storyline: Henna Wendel, is looking for the ring to set her people free. These include healing and leading them into a new world. Henna will have to fight the monsters and also search for rings in the entire Empire. Henna is a Cyberpunk Specie Trying to save her people. In order to make that happen she will have to take on the monsters to liberate her people.
summary: “This is a Free to play Third Person Shooter Game Set for Henna to challenge and Liberate Nexirus. It is designed to create a challenge between role playing weapons and Sci-fi weapons. Dive into Henna's world and set yourself on a deliverance quest.”
